content: The Orion Services Group now has the capability to serve as customers’ needs through the complete life cycle of initial project engineering, product design, lighting fixture installation, commissioning of control systems, and ongoing maintenance services. With respect to our current fiscal year outlook, as referenced in today’s announcement, Orion remains committed to its goal of achieving fiscal ‘22 full year revenue of at least $150 million. Second quarter fiscal ‘22 operating expenses increased to $5.8 million versus $5.4 million in Q2 ‘21, due to ramping business volume offset by $800,000 in worker retention tax credits.
